item.title: TikTok skin-care routines could put teens at risk of lifelong allergy
item.description: It turns out when teens on TikTok say, "Get ready with me," it can be more harmful than they might realize.

item.title: Preemies receive sucrose for pain relief—new research shows it doesn't stop long-term impacts on development
item.description: Infants born very preterm spend weeks or even months in the neonatal intensive care unit (NICU) while their immature brains are still developing.
